questions.question: Which of the following can be used to output text in Java?

Complete the code to output this:

Java is so great!
I can print text!
Which of the following would result in an error?
What is the difference between pring and println?

answers.answer: System.out.println() prints the text on a new line, while System.out.print() does not.
System.out.print() prints the text on a new line, while System.out.println() does not.
System.out.println() is for printing long pieces of text, while System.out.print() is for shorter text.
They do the same thing but have different names.
